title: Any guess as to the original typeface for this grunge font?
content:
I'm curious to know what this free grunge font (called 4990810) is based on? Can anyone venture a guess?

Much appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [4990810\_font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327180457/http:/typophile.com/files/4990810_font.png) | 199.99 KB |
author: sfreund

comments.content: Nothing of the top of my head. Try checking out [dafont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327180457/http:/www.dafont.com/)?

I know it's available on dafont. That's not what I'm asking.

I'd like to know what font people think it's based on. I've looked at a few sans serif fonts but haven't come up with anything similar so far.

Thanks!

Titling Gothic, like Alternate Gothic and Knockout, is similar but not the same. Some letters look identical but others, especially the "G" and the "K," are very different.

Also, overall his letters look a bit more boxy, or squarish, than any of the fonts mentioned here.

These are a good start, nonetheless. So thanks a lot!
